Description: On I-81 at mile marker 192 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 7 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane, right shoulder, and exit ramp are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect delays due to congestion. Traffic backups are approximately 3.5 miles.
